Posts.EditableText:
Hi,
would like to play a german adventure. Are there any and where can i find them?

My english is just what i learned in school - for text-based riddles and puzzles it is not good enough :(

Would be very nice if you could help me!

Thx a lot
Horz
Posts.HTML:
Hi,
would like to play a german adventure. Are there any and where can i find them?

Posts.EditableText:
just try "german" or "deutsch" in the game search.
I like https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ko8mzafcceyfshar4lpujw/die-konigin-von-saba-the-queen-of-sheba although it is only a short demo

A good idea is to play english games in Chrome and activate the translation. You just have to remember to enter the commands in english :-)
